content.rendered:
Directed by Thirumala Kishore

Written by Gautam Siddharth

Cast Sai Dharam Tej (Vijay Krishna (as Sai Tej)). Kalyani Priyadarshan (Lahari). Nivetha Pethuraj (K. Swecha). Sunil (Michael / Mike / Glassmate (as Suneel)). Vennela Kishore (Kishore). Krishna Murali Posani (Narayana). Brahmaji (Janardhan). Himaja (Navneetha). Pavitra Lokesh (Swecha’s Mother (as Pavithra Lokesh)). V. Jayaprakash (CEO). Rohini Hattangadi (Judge). Rao Ramesh (Lawyer Purushottham). Bharath Reddy (Bharath). Hyper Aadi (Ajay). Prabhas Sreenu (Repair shop owner). Sudharshan (Vijay’s friend). Yeissha Adarah (Lahari’s friend) .Chammak Chandra.Giri.Jai. Kesava Karri (Sreenivas).Karthik.Arun Kumar.Roopa Laxmi.Mahesh. Vinni Mobstaz (Vinni).Rajasri Nair. Rajshri Nair (Chitra’s Mother). Pradeep (Krishna Rao). Venkat Prasad. Priya.Bharat Raj. Manik Reddy (Aziz Bhai). Santhoshi Sammidi (Chitra’s sister). Sandhya. Santoshi. Sree Satya. Srinu. Suresh. Teju. Yash

Languages Telugu

Producers Mohan Cherukuri. Rahul Gandhi. Satish Koppineedi. Chiranjeevi Pedamallu. Marpuri Praveen. Y. Ravi Shankar. K.V.V. Bala Subramanyam. Naveen Yerneni

Production Mythri Movie Maker. Goldmines Telefilm
